mapper.sql: id, ent_id, ent_pre_id, pre_id, mobile, realname, plate_no, user_id
mapper.insert: insert into t_ent_brand_user (id, ent_id, ent_pre_id, pre_id, mobile, realname, plate_no, user_id) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{entId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{entPreId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{preId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{realname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{plateNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT})
mapper.update: update t_ent_brand_user set ent_id = #{entId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, ent_pre_id = #{entPreId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, pre_id = #{preId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, mobile = #{mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, realname = #{realname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, plate_no = #{plateNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
